description: This Java source file defines a Spring Shell component for managing door lock devices in a mock Zigbee environment. It includes commands for listing, adding, locking, unlocking, toggling, and managing battery status and PINs for door lock devices.

classes.name: DoorLockDeviceShell
classes.description: A shell command component that manages door lock devices via CLI commands in a mock Zigbee environment.

classes.name: DoorLockDeviceShell.NameValueProvider
classes.description: Inner class that provides device name suggestions for CLI commands by extending DeviceNameProvider.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all door lock devices with their details in a formatted table.

methods.name: addDoorLock
methods.description: Adds a new door lock device with an optional name.

methods.name: lock
methods.description: Locks the specified door lock device.

methods.name: unlock
methods.description: Unlocks the specified door lock device.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the lock state of the specified door lock device.

methods.name: lowBattery
methods.description: Marks the specified door lock as having a low battery.

methods.name: lowBatteryRestore
methods.description: Removes the low battery status from the specified door lock.

methods.name: lowBatteryToggle
methods.description: Toggles the low battery status of the specified door lock.

methods.name: addPin
methods.description: Adds a PIN code to the specified door lock with given parameters.

methods.name: getPins
methods.description: Retrieves and prints all PIN codes associated with the specified door lock.
